snippet: Recorded music generated $6.97 billion in 2014, down from slightly more than $7 billion in 2013, the Recording Industry Association of American reported.
abstract: Recording Industry Assn of America releases report that shows income from streaming music services has become major part of business and has outperformed CD sales for first time; report reveals that recorded music made $6.97 billion in revenue in 2014, down from around $7 billion year earlier.
lead_paragraph: Recorded music generated $6.97 billion in 2014, down from slightly more than $7 billion in 2013, the Recording Industry Association of American reported.

headline.main: Sales of Streaming Music Top CDs in Flat Year for Industry
headline.print_headline: Sales of Streaming Music Top CDs in Flat Year for Industry
